mapper.select: INSERT INTO alarm ( post_pk, p_user_pk, c_user_pk, cmd ) VALUES ( #{post_pk}, #{p_user_pk}, #{c_user_pk}, #{cmd} );
SELECT a.*, u.name, p.title FROM alarm AS a JOIN user_info AS u ON a.c_user_pk = u.pk JOIN post AS p ON a.post_pk = p.pk WHERE a.p_user_pk = #{p_user_pk} ORDER BY a.pk DESC
